title: adi kaadu bhajana
sahitya:
adi kAdu bhajana, manasA  

(adi kAdu)



anupallavi



edalO nenchu TokaTi payyeda galginacO nokaTi  

(adi kAdu)



caraNam



goppa tanamukai yAsa kutsita viSaya pipAsa meppulakai

bahu vEsamiDi uppatilledaru, tyAgarAja vinuta   

(adi kAdu)
